title: Swissotel Living Jeddah - Accor - LPP
offer_address: Building No 2652 Prince Saud Al Faisal Street 7490 Al Khaldiya, JEDDAH, SAUDI ARABIA, SAUDI ARABIA, 23422

title: Jeddah Five-Star Urban Escape with Glamorous Red Sea Vistas
description: Enjoy a luxurious city retreat on the coast of Saudi Arabia and take in stunning views of the Red Sea at InterContinental Jeddah, an IHG Hotel. Overlooking the Jeddah Corniche and King Fahad's Fountain, and close to historic locations and shopping areas, this is the perfect base from which to explore this cosmopolitan city. Be spoilt for choice when dining at one of the five restaurants onsite, cool off by plunging in the outdoor pool or relax in a stylish and comfortable room or suite.
offer_address: Al Hamra Corniche, Jeddah, 21531, Saudi Arabia

title: Elegant Stay in Jeddah with Rooftop Pool, Restaurant & Spa
description:
Experience the vibrant heart of Jeddah in style at the elegant residence in town. Just 51 minutes from King Abdulaziz International Airport and the scenic Jeddah Corniche, this modern hotel offers spacious rooms with all the comforts you need-minibar, AC and more.

Unwind at the rooftop pool, indulge in spa treatments, or enjoy international cuisine at Palm Restaurant. Perfect for business or leisure, the hotel features sleek meeting rooms and is a short drive from top attractions like the iconic Jeddah Tower, King Fahd’s Fountain and Red Sea Mall. Whether you're exploring the historic charm of Old Jeddah or relaxing seaside, this is your gateway to the city’s best.
offer_address: Prince Mohammed Bin Abdulaziz Street, Jeddah 21493, Saudi Arabia

title: Jeddah Self-Contained Apartment Escape with Onsite Dining, Pool & Spa
description:
Experience true modern comfort at this stylish oasis, ideally located on Jeddah's bustling Malik Road. Dive into the city's history at the nearby Al-Balad district, a UNESCO World Heritage site, or indulge in a shopping spree at the upscale Mall of Arabia. At the end of the day, retreat to your spacious retreat, complete with a kitchenette and stunning vistas.

Continue the indulgence by the sunlit rooftop pool, indulge in relaxing spa treatments and sample international flavours at Ibis Kitchen. Whether you’re exploring the historic charm of Old Jeddah or relaxing seaside, this is your gateway to the city’s best, with the comforts of home back to return to each day.
offer_address: King Abdul Aziz Road, Az Zahra District, Jeddah, 21352, Saudi Arabia

title: Saudi Arabia Stylish Jeddah City Break near King Fahd's Fountain
description: Overlooking glittering shorelines and the shining Red Sea is Crowne Plaza Jeddah, an IHG Hotel, an oasis of five-star luxury just a short wander from the waters of King Fahd’s Fountain, the tallest of its type in the world. After days spent exploring the UNECSO World Heritage-listed alleyways of historic Jeddah, wandering through vibrant souqs or shipwreck-diving in the Red Sea, head to Sakura for mouthwatering sashimi moriawase or Mashrabia Café for decadent treats and ice-cold sips.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Jeddah, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: al Ma'Adi Road, Al Corniche, Jeddah 21443, Saudi Arabia

title: Five-Star Jeddah Luxury with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Experience contemporary luxury blended with rich Arabic hospitality at Crowne Plaza Jeddah Al Salam, an IHG Hotel, an opulent escape in Saudi Arabia's cosmopolitan port city. Escape the heat and take a dip in the rooftop swimming pool overlooking the city, or retreat to the calm spa where massages, thermal bathing and a sauna await to invigorate. Be tempted by the buffet at the resort's signature Mavi Restaurant, where live cooking stations and international cuisine are sure to delight.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Jeddah Al Salam, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 7755 Prince Sultan Road, Al-Muhammadiyah District, Jeddah 21352, Saudi Arabia

title: Modern Apartment Stay in Central Jeddah near Corniche with Three Restaurants & Pool
description:
In the heart of Jeddah's bustling city centre, this chic aparthotel offers all the home comforts for a relaxing escape. This contemporary retreat offers spacious apartments, each equipped with a full kitchen, ideal for those seeking a home-away-from-home experience. Enjoy moments of bliss by the pool or maintain your fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym.

Venture out to explore the nearby attractions: you're just a short stroll from the famous Tahlia Street, renowned for its high-end shopping and dining. Visit the historic Al-Balad district, a UNESCO World Heritage site, or explore the stunning coastline of the Red Sea. After a day of sightseeing, return to the hotel for tasty Italian at Trattoria da Toto, followed by drinks at the rooftop After 11 Lounge.
offer_address: Madinah Branch Road, Al Andalus, Jeddah 23326, Saudi Arabia

title: Mövenpick Elegance in the Heart of Jeddah with Rooftop Pool & Bar
description:
The magic of Jeddah awaits with a five-star stay at this sleek Mövenpick retreat, ideally located near vibrant shopping districts, the historic Al-Balad and modern attractions like teamLab Borderless. When you're not out exploring, unwind with a massage, take a dip in the rooftop pool or sip a mocktail while soaking in views of the port city skyline.

Savour a variety of international flavours at Al Deira, the hotel's all-day dining restaurant offering everything from buffet spreads to themed nights. For a more relaxed dining experience, Al Moltaqa Café serves afternoon tea and light treats in a regal, 16th-century-inspired setting.
